result.arabic_text: قُلِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓۗ ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
result.translation: 59.Nabii Mucammadow: faatoo kee fayla Yalli leeh isi naqoosay (kay farmoytit kinnuk) isi farmoh dooritel nagaynan kaak yanay, tohuk lakal A-korosey Yalli yayse innaa, hinnay Yallat agleh haan numtinwwellittey usun yaqbudeeni tayseeh keenik ixxic? (Yalli yayse).
